title: Crafted SFX Vol.1
description: A high quality 370 SFX asset pack aimed at Futuristic and Sci-Fi Action game titles. Provides the core sounds needed to start your next game including weapons, ambiances, impacts, and much more.
longDescription:
Sound Samples: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k4e1wD5eeI8&feature=youtu.be


Welcome to the next professional release from 405 Music! This pack features 370 high quality sound effects specially crafted for futuristic and action games. The pack spans multiple categories including Weapons (Foley and Futuristic), Ambiances, Impacts, Risers, Mechanical, and much more. We have consulted with top developers to ensure we are providing core sounds that are in the highest demand for indie game development. These sounds are specially produced to integrate seamlessly in your workflow. The entire pack is professionally mastered, all ambiances are loopable, and all the sounds are organized for quick and easy searching. Overall, this pack is the perfect way to ensure that with one purchase, you have access to the highest quality sounds for your next Sci-Fi Action release. Enjoy!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • User Interface Beep, Click, and Glitch FX Included
  • Synthesized and Organic Sound Sources
  • Alien and Creature Sounds including Dialects and Voice FX
  • Mixture of Current and Futuristic Rifle, Handgun, Canon, and Laser SFX (Shots and Reloads)
  • Foley Sounds Included
  • Trailer Impacts and Risers
  • Simple to Complex Layers 
  • LISTof Entire Asset Pack Content List

 ---

Number of Audio Waves: 370

Number of Audio Cues: 392

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: Yes (The 22 Ambience audio files come in loops and one-shots)

Minutes of audio provided: 17+ minutes

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: 4.19


DOCUMENTATION URL:https://drive.google.com/file/d/10uUqH2g8Yh8YUGts-N4Dp3Hw84DT0HZ0/view

VIDEO URL:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k4e1wD5eeI8&feature=youtu.be
